##Task 2
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

airquality |> 
  group_by(Month) |> 
  summarise(mean_temp = mean(Temp)) |> 
  filter(mean_temp == max(mean_temp))
```
```{r}
#Task2
library(dplyr)
colnames(airquality)
rownames(airquality)
head(airquality, 6)
nrow(airquality)
tail(airquality, 6)
sum(is.na(airquality$Ozone))
mean(airquality$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
subset(airquality, Ozone > 31 & Temp > 90)
```
